    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AuthController
    Controller responsible for handling user authentication and registration processes.
    AuthResponse
    Represents the response sent to the client after an authentication attempt.
    AuthService
    Service class responsible for handling user authentication and registration logic.
    Game
    Represents a video game entity within the application.
    GameRowsValidationTest
    Integration tests for validating specific data rows in the database.
    GenreChallengeController
    Controller for the "Genre Challenge" quiz mode.
    GenreChallengeService
    Service class dedicated to generating questions for the "Genre Challenge" quiz.
    ImageQuizController
    Controller handling the "Image Quiz" game mode (Guess the Game from an image).
    ImageQuizService
    Service class for the "Image Quiz" game mode (Guess the Game from an image).
    ImageQuizService.ComparisonResponse
    Represents a Data Transfer Object (DTO) used to convey the results of a comparison (e.g., in a guessing game where a user's guess is validated against a target).
    LeaderboardController
    Controller responsible for managing and retrieving leaderboard data.
    LeaderboardEntry
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a single entry on the leaderboard.
    LoginRequest
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) for capturing user login credentials.
    MultiFactMixQuizController
    Controller for the "Multi-Fact Mix" quiz mode.
    MultiFactMixQuizService
    Service class dedicated to generating questions for the "Multi-Fact Mix" quiz.
    NewReleasesController
    Controller for the "New Releases" quiz mode.
    NewReleasesService
    Service class dedicated to generating questions for the "New Releases" quiz.
    PlatformMatchController
    Controller for the "Platform Match" quiz mode.
    PlatformMatchService
    Service class dedicated to generating questions for the "Platform Match" quiz.
    Question
    Represents a single quiz question presented to the user.
    QuizBackendApplication
    Main application class for the Quiz Backend.
    RatingEstimatorQuizController
    Controller for the "Rating Estimator" quiz mode.
    RatingEstimatorQuizService
    Service class dedicated to generating questions for the "Rating Estimator" quiz.
    RegisterRequest
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) for user registration.
    ResultController
    Controller responsible for saving and retrieving user quiz results.
    ResultRequest
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) for submitting quiz results.
    ResultService
    Service class responsible for persistence and retrieval of quiz results and leaderboard data.
    RetroQuizController
    Controller for the "Retro Quiz" game mode.
    RetroQuizService
    Service class dedicated to generating questions for the "Retro Quiz" game mode.
    UserController
    Controller responsible for user profile management and identification.
    UserProfileDto
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) representing a user's public profile.
    UserService
    Service class for handling user-specific data retrieval and profile management.
